title: Personal Spiritual Development and the Church: Discord Q/A June 11th, 2021
description:
Weekly Q/A on the Bridges of Meaning Discord Server, Fridays at 10am Pacific Time. 

Join us on Discord:uuah-2bd8-t7ww-exsc-762b

0:00:40  Intro
0:04:10  Martial arts belts analogy for deconstruction and return to purity
0:13:10  What happens to the ones that leave and don’t return?
0:17:45  Shouldn’t we avoid using demonic kind of language? - Naming
0:21:45  Are psalms an anatomy of a fallen person’s or Christ’s soul?
0:29:20  How would PVK like the Jordan Peterson Meetup, Sacramento, to develop? 
0:45:35  Can the pastor set the tone for a congregation?
0:51:35  When should the pastor step up if things stray too far?
1:06:10  Paradox: Let God’s light shine vs No virtue signaling (Matthew 6)
1:18:20  Was there a push for churches to unite against communism during the Cold War?
1:28:00  Judgement: virtue signaling topic continued (real life case study)
1:36:25  How has PVK changed in the last 20-30 years? 
1:39:10  Do Calvinists value civic duty?
1:43:15  Will there be free will in the afterlife?
1:45:45  What does PVK mean by “crunchy?”
1:48:10  What are the problems and possibilities of online communities?
1:55:00  Can PVK give a detailed explanation of what church community is?
2:14:40  Were Swiss iconoclasts of the Swiss Reformation inspired by Swiss mountains?
2:16:30  Does PVK loves dogs or cats?
